Represents a cookie.

Constructor Detail

Cookie

public Cookie(String sourceUrl,
              String cookieStr)
       throws Exception
Creates a Cookie for the specified sourceUrl from the specified cookieString, which has the following format (optional [] in any order): 
  "cookieName=cookieValue   (every cookie must have name and value, value can be "".  This is the only req. field)
  [; expires=timeInGMTString]  (eg expires=Thu, 15-Apr-2010 20:00:00 GMT)
  [; path=pathName]
  [; domain=domainName]
  [; secure]
  [; HttpOnly]"

Throws:
Exception
